prediction.health: You will feel full of energy and a new optimism today. You will be very particular today regarding your health, diet and hygiene. Some friend will inspire you to start a new diet or new exercise pattern. Avoid wearing uncomfortable clothing and/or footwear.
prediction.emotions: Your emotions are stable today and you will generally be in a cheerful mood.
prediction.profession: Today is a favorable day for resolving differences & disputes in office. You may get good news regarding promotion, financial gains & profits in business. This is an excellent time to make decisions regarding your financial affairs, as your judgment is sound and reliable.
prediction.luck: Today is one of the lucky days for you when destiny smiles on you. It has the potential to take you to new heights.
prediction.personal_life: You will feel full of energy and a new optimism today. You will be very particular today regarding your health, diet and hygiene. Some friend will inspire you to start a new diet or new exercise pattern. Avoid wearing uncomfortable clothing and/or footwear.
prediction.travel: You might go to new places of your liking. Official trips are also likely.

prediction.health: You will find yourself to be more robust and energetic. You are likely to take up a new natural health program. Eat a well balanced diet to keep yourself in good condition.
prediction.emotions: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.profession: Your creative talents will prove to be highly lucrative if put to proper use. Today can prove to be very productive for you. You will come up with new ideas and strategies. Financial position will be good.
prediction.luck: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.personal_life: Your passionate desires and romantic feelings are very strong now. Someone from your past is likely to contact you and make it a memorable day. Your energy level is high; this is a good time for team activities.
prediction.travel: You may engage in some religious activity or visit a spiritual place today.

prediction.health: Anxiety can be the cause of some health related problems today. You tend to worry too much. You can boost your energy levels by doing yoga. Intake of balanced diet is must.
prediction.emotions: You will be in the right mood for a relaxed and enjoyable evening in the company of your family. You will be full of enthusiasm and able to handle everything efficiently.
prediction.profession: Those in jobs will be able to showcase their talent and will get better opportunities in work. Time is favorable for those involved in social or political work. Economically, the situation will remain stable. Avoid lending money to others.
prediction.luck: Today is an average day from luck point of view. Things will move smoothly with little hindrances.
prediction.personal_life: You will enjoy the company of your beloved. You may like to spend quality time with family but this may not be possible due to your busy schedule. Ignoring problems will not make them disappear. It’s better to face them with conviction.
prediction.travel: Travelling will not bring immediate results but will lay down good foundation for potential benefits.

prediction.health: You need to take precautions against all sorts of allergies and viral infections today, though it will not be easy to avoid. Get immediate medical attention if you notice even a minor health problem.
prediction.emotions: You will have a tendency to act in a rather irrational, demanding way towards others.  You need to control your emotions and avoid doing anything that could deteriorate the situation.
prediction.profession: There may be difficult situations at work. People may harm your reputation and misunderstandings may occur. Sudden changes in work are also likely will increase pressure on you. This is not a good time to decide on new investments.
prediction.luck: This is not an auspicious time to venture into anything new. Things would not work in your favor.
prediction.personal_life: Romantic overtures will not pay. You will experience disappointment in love. Your family shall expect a lot from you which could annoy you. Try to be more calm and composed in your approach.
prediction.travel: This is not at all a good time for travelling. There shall be hindrances and you shall not gain anything out of the trips made.

prediction.health: It is important for you to adopt some relaxation techniques so that you do not accumulate needless stress and endanger your health. Ensure that you get plenty of physical exercise today. Include breathing exercises in order to relieve nervous tension.
prediction.emotions: You shall be more emotional than usual today and end up risking your vulnerable self to others.
prediction.profession: Finances will continue to be good in spite of increase in expenditure. At work heavy responsibility and chaotic activities will keep you on toes. New opportunities will come your way. Grab this opportunity while there is still time.
prediction.luck: Luck will favor your moderately. You will be able to achieve great things by your small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: Differences of attitudes in married life will continue. Avoid strong arguments with spouse. There may be disagreements with friends and associates. It is better not to give loans or sign surety for anyone, howsoever close to you.
prediction.travel: You might go on an unexpected tour today. Enjoy the journey.

prediction.health: Health will remain fine; however stress and strain may remain high. It is advisable to go for a complete change in your health and fitness regime. Include green leafy vegetables in your diet and meditation in your lifestyle.
prediction.emotions: You shall be imaginative and warm and shall exude such charm which others will find irresistible. Also, you will be more sentimental.

prediction.luck: Success will come knocking at your doorstep. It’s time to redirect your energy to start something new.

prediction.travel: Travel is predicted but it will be troublesome. Be careful when you are driving today.

prediction.health: Your stamina will be good. Take care in all health matters - prevention is better than cure. If you take care of your daily food habits, you are going to enjoy excellent health. A detoxification diet will work wonders.
prediction.emotions: You feel good and warm today towards just about everyone around you. Original ideas will fill your mind.

prediction.health: Avoid rich foods or else there is a likelihood of a stomach problem. Anxiety can be the cause of some health related problems today. You tend to worry too much. Remain alert while driving and while taking up a journey.

prediction.profession: Keep your mind open, and look out for sudden developments. Be focused and be proactive in every opportunity that comes your way. Some unwanted expenses may create an imbalance on your financial resources.
